patch.description: The columns in the Explore tab table are now sorted correctly according to their types.
patch.title: fix(explorer): type-based sorting (#3340)

patch.description: Added support for ERC-4337 bundled transactions, monitoring them by either listening to chain blocks or using the `observer` transport wrapper. Each user operation within a bundled transaction is displayed as an individual transaction in the Observe tab.
patch.title: feat(explorer): bundled transactions support (#3313)

patch.description: Deployer now retrieves resource tags by fetching logs to work around RPC rate limiting issues.
patch.title: chore: add changeset for cli PR #3350 (#3353)

patch.description: Fixed a bug in `watchLogs` where logs from the buffer were not applied during the initial sync.
patch.title: fix(store-sync): apply logs from buffer in watchLogs (#3346)

patch.description: Deployer will now throw an error if it detects an already registered table with a different schema than the one you are trying to deploy.
patch.title: fix(cli): throw error on schema changes (#3336)

patch.description: When accessing a new table in Explore tab, the SQL editor now encloses column names that are also PostgreSQL keywords in double quotes in order to prevent invalid queries.
patch.title: fix(explorer): format default sql query (#3307)

patch.description: Using a TS extension (rather than DTS) now correctly includes `as const` in the TS output.
patch.title: fix(abi-ts): ts output should use as const (#3348)

patch.description: `getFunctions` now internally uses `fetchLogs` for better handling of block range errors.
patch.title: fix(world): use fetchLogs in getFunctions (#3338)

patch.description: Experimental pending logs watcher now reconnects if it loses connection or times out.
patch.title: fix(store-sync): reconnect unresponsive watchLogs socket (#3301)

major.description: Fixed world ABI fetching in Rhodolite.
major.title: fix(explorer): switch to fetchBlockLogs (#3352)
